name: Pong Game (AChen06)
description:
This is a single player pong game, where you face off against the CPU. You score when the CPU is unable to recover the ball that you bounce. This version of Pong has four gamemodes: Easy, Normal, Hard, and Death Match.

Please enjoy playing this game :D

How to Run

Run Pong.exe to start playing

How to Play and Rules

You can use both WA keys or up/down arrow keys to move your paddle up and down.

Winning and Losing Conditions

For the first three difficulties (Easy, Normal, and Hard), you win the round when you score five points against the CPU. However, you lose the round when the CPU scores five points against you.

For the Death Match difficulty, the first to score on the other side wins the round. Each level of difficulty has increased CPU response and speed, along with faster ball speed.

Notes

I couldn't get the MacOS version of the game to run (something to do with permissions), but I've decided to keep it here in case someone knows how to get it to work on Mac.
